column4: Can anyone help? I boot ubuntu to live and get sounds of desktop but no picture.
Also install gets no picture.
The menu on first boot with Try without effects to computer, Install, memtst or w/e comes up but everything past leads to no display.
Which video card ?
Intel
Maybe you can try booting with nomodeset as a kernel param to disable kms
okay, also i get a message when booting Backtrack4 that screens found but none usable so assume its same effect.
But when i use fixvesa it works in backtrack, but no way to type that in ubuntu since its not non-graphic startup like backtrack.
If nomodeset doesn't help you can try using the vesa driver
How would i go about doing that?
ubuntulog: What happens if you run 'fusion-icon' in your terminal?
Nver had a prob like this b4 :( , lol guess it happens eventually.
You would have to generate an xorg.conf with 'Xorg -configure' then put the following line in the Device section:  Driver "vesa"
Okay where would i use Xorg -configure ? Since its not installed i have no cmd line.
btw, after it starts with a black screen, can you do Ctrl+Alt+F# to get to a console?
can i use it as a boot parameter?
Just any number?
Any F# key i guess =P
yes
! tty | JKemp
Okay thank you. Later.
any number between 1-6
Thank you. Will see if it works. =)
